c0c306e1-a2d9-4c3f-aa50-316c4ccfe496.description: Earners of this badge have developed their Academic Writing & Research skills as part of the FXUA Path to Success Program. They have built the writing skills needed to be considered college ready by demonstrating the ability to effectively express their ideas in written form. They are prepared to differentiate between essay types/purposes, identify reliable sources, critically reflect on academic literature, and use the Internet/databases to conduct research.
c0c306e1-a2d9-4c3f-aa50-316c4ccfe496.name: FXUA Path to Success Program: Academic Writing & Research

issuer.summary: issued by Fairfax University of America

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the WritePlacer Essay assessment.
Complete course requirements for the assigned Academic Writing & Research course.

0e8bf6c1-addf-47ad-9605-592841874da3.description: Earners of this badge have developed their Math skills as part of the FXUA Path to Success Program. They have built the mathematical ability needed to be considered college ready, primarily focused on quantitative reasoning, algebra, and statistics.
0e8bf6c1-addf-47ad-9605-592841874da3.name: FXUA Path to Success Program: Math

issuer.summary: issued by Fairfax University of America

Complete course requirements for the assigned Math course.

473584f2-fe58-44c8-9aee-c5f82924d8dc.description: Earners of this badge have built capacities for career success – regardless of what they choose to do or the organizations they join. Career success is achieved by finding work that is fulfilling and allows you to lead a happy life – one with inner peace, joy, and a sense of self-fulfillment. Career success also includes a reasonable level of financial stability. Students are equipped with the knowledge and skills to prepare them for a lifetime of social performance and personal fulfillment.
473584f2-fe58-44c8-9aee-c5f82924d8dc.name: FXUA Transformative Learning and Leadership in Practice: Career Success

issuer.summary: issued by Fairfax University of America

alignments.name: FXUA Transformative Learning and Leadership in Practice Micro-Credentials Standards Document

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Career Success Micro-Credential pre-assessment.
Complete TLLP 250: Designing Your Career. Course requirements and evaluation criteria consist of Written Assignments, Participation, Self-Assessments, Experiential Assignments, and Presentations.
Complete TLLP 275: Practices of Social Impact. Course requirements and evaluation criteria consist of Written Assignments, Participation, Models of Impact Game, and Presentations.

Complete TLLP 425: Practices of Career Planning and Leadership. Course requirements and evaluation criteria consist of Written Assignments, Participation, Self-Assessments, Experiential Assignments, and Presentations.
Complete the Career Success Micro-Credential post-assessment.

skills.name: Developing And Sustaining A Growth Mindset

3beeba4f-5acb-4825-aa4d-71aed965a28b.description: Earners of this badge have developed the fundamental competencies for decision-making and problem-solving, and they are prepared to apply those competencies in day-to-day situations of work and life. Decision-making is a choice made by using one’s judgement. Problem-solving is a process used to identify possible solutions at hand. Decision-making and problem-solving are essential skills for both business and life, and many life situations call for both.
3beeba4f-5acb-4825-aa4d-71aed965a28b.name: FXUA Transformative Learning and Leadership in Practice: Decision-Making and Problem-Solving

issuer.summary: issued by Fairfax University of America

alignments.name: FXUA Transformative Learning and Leadership in Practice Micro-Credentials Standards Document

Complete TLLP 400: Models of Thinking. Course requirements and evaluation criteria consist of Written Assignments, Participation, Experiential Assignments, and Presentations.
Complete the Decision-Making and Problem-Solving Micro-Credential post-assessment.

skills.name: Understanding And Applying Theories Of Thinking For Problem-Solving And Decision-Making

6af70f4e-b680-4800-81f6-59f85bd114e4.description: Earners of this badge have broadened their worldview and engendered pro-social values and practices. They demonstrate cultural awareness, embrace diversity, promote social justice, and commit to responsibilities to act. Students understand the context of global citizenship and their individual role, identity, and worldview as a global citizen.
6af70f4e-b680-4800-81f6-59f85bd114e4.name: FXUA Transformative Learning and Leadership in Practice: Global Citizenship

issuer.summary: issued by Fairfax University of America

Complete INCS 325: Practices of Global Citizenship. Course requirements and evaluation criteria consist of Written Assignments, Participation, Self-Assessments, and Presentations.
Complete the Global Citizenship Micro-Credential post-assessment.

3c37700c-b483-4631-83ea-4dbd5c4e3381.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their capacity for personal resilience and can build community resilience, address challenges, and pursue opportunities for a life of self-fulfillment. Personal resilience may be defined as behaviors, thoughts, and actions that promote wellbeing and mental health. Personal resilience allows students to effectively maintain or return to a state of wellbeing when facing change, adversity, and stress in life’s situations.
3c37700c-b483-4631-83ea-4dbd5c4e3381.name: FXUA Transformative Learning and Leadership in Practice: Personal Resilience

issuer.summary: issued by Fairfax University of America

Complete HUMN 200: Designing Your Life. Course requirements and evaluation criteria consist of Written Assignments, Participation, Self-Assessments, Experiential Assignments, and Presentations.
Complete the Personal Resilience Micro-Credential post-assessment.

47b1d726-3ba2-45ab-a305-93e7db46f79a.description: Earners of this badge have developed individual competencies for contributing to the social mission of their organization. Students have built personal capacity for, and commitments to, taking actions that generate positive social impact. Social impact may be defined as “a significant positive change that addresses a pressing social challenge," such as reducing vulnerability, promoting social justice, alleviating poverty, and improving positive impact on the environment or the community.

2169c79a-9205-4ed5-9f81-a72a59b5036d.description: Earners of this badge have been trained on bringing products and services to the market; how, when, and where to go to market; and how to maximize sales using four marketing mixes known as the 4 Ps: Product design and branding, formulating the best Pricing techniques, selecting the best sales Place or location, and increasing sales through Promotion and best communications methods (conventional and social media).

4297e27b-809c-4923-8f3f-0993679e282d.description: Earners of this badge have acquired a toolkit for applying economic principles to assess current and past business events. 52c8764e-6572-4ae0-8a34-79510680e1c3.description: Earners of this badge have developed their College Readiness & Study Skills as part of the FXUA Path to Success Program.
